name: Caradio
0:
”Alexa, tell car radio to play Shape of you on Spotify”
”Alexa, tell car radio to call Mike”
”Alexa, tell car radio to go to Airport”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: car radio
des: Caradio turn words into actions with a mobile application with Amazon Alexa. It is an in-vehicle voice service with a mobile application. Enable the Caradio skill and the Mobile Application will serve as your always-ready driving companion, with hand-free access to Amazon's popular Alexa Voice Service technology and reliable in-App features.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
